channel.title: Pa!n
channel.description: We are a COD4 PS3 clan, i am not the leader my friend, leorules123 on PSN is send him a message if you want to join. We consist of five main members: Myself, Leorules123, Bean94, dhalem, freefaller10. Occasionaly Killa_boy will play with me and Leorules123. Out of the 5 of us me and Leorules123 are the best we often play as a pair but we do want more members for private matches and comps

item.title: Pa!n
item.dc:creator: @ninja_nub ninja nub
item.description:
@ninja_nub wrote:

Take a look at my thread. Just make it organized… More appealing.

Read full topic

item.title: Pa!n
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:4, topic:206750”]Information, a member list, thing’s you will be doing, a schedule. You need to set up matches and organise positions. Make some tactics and crap to make the game more interesting. Basicallly all you’re doing is getting a group of people together to be unorganised and shoot some people. That’s not what a clan is… at least not what a good clan is.

You obviously aren’t the type of person to do this so leave it to someone else.[/quote]
Thats why i’m not the leader but i have made a members list and we don’t have any rivals, often we do clan matches within ourselves but any clan looking to play us let me know and i will organized it

Read full topic
